articles.author: Tushar Goenka
articles.title: Ecosystem, not price play: Why the made in India iPhone costs an arm and a leg in India - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The tech giant’s moves to manufacture products, set up stores and partner with resellers are all part of its plan to set up an ecosystem in India. It is unlikely to lower prices and play the volume game.
articles.content: Apples decision to keep the prices of the latest iPhone elevated may have surprised buyers, but industry experts said that the tech titan was never gearing up to assemble in India to lower prices. Th… [+4415 chars]

articles.author: Mark Gurman
articles.title: Apple Tech Support Staff Urged to Stay Mum on iPhone 12 Radiation Issue - Bloomberg
articles.description: Apple Inc., facing a controversy in France over the iPhone 12’s radiation levels, has advised tech-support staff not to volunteer any information when consumers ask about the issue.
articles.content:
Apple Inc., facing a controversy in France over the iPhone 12s radiation levels, has advised tech-support staff not to volunteer any information when consumers ask about the issue.
